ModMetaData.name: More Mental Breaks
ModMetaData.author: nüke
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds new mental breaks to the game.
Extreme mental breaks: > Self-Harm: The pawn will cut their wrists and hide in their room. - Medium base chance to occur. - High chance to occur for Masochist trait.
Major mental breaks: > Antisocial: The pawn becomes depressed and roams away from the colony for a while. - High chance to occur.
Minor mental breaks: > Apathy: The pawn becomes lethargic and will often wander around instead of working. They cannot be manually assigned to tasks or drafted while they are apathetic. - High chance to occur.
